item.title: Missing utility cover on road outside 21 Sutton Row W1, 14th November
item.description:
Missing utility cover on road outside 21 Sutton Row W1. Causes dangerous trip hazard and cycle risk. Midway along green facade, missing cover should be located in road near kerb, under double yellow lines. Please follow up with relevant utility provider to make good.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Sutton Row, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside of 85C Dyne Road, 14th November
item.description:
A pallet of bricks has been left outside in the parking bay since mid-2025. This issue has been reported to the council multiple times by residents and has still not been resolved. These bricks are a nuisance as they are blocking essential parking space for residents. This issue has gone on for way too long â€“ they need to be removed. Threats to fine those responsible for dumping them are pointless if no real action is taken. They need to be removed immediately.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dyne Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish due to fly tiping, 14th November
item.description:
Constant fly tipping here and all the way along this section of street between elderfirld and median roads leads to CONSTANT litter like this which is hardly ever cleared away. Hackney Council this is your job. What are you doing to address the problem?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Blurton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Residents of the flats above fly tip in the commercial waste, 14th November
item.description:
I am writing on behalf of the Crystal Palace Day Nursery which is located at 49 Maberley Road. We have residents living at the flats above our nursery. we believe the resident fly tip their waste into our bins. Please contact the residents and make them aware they mustn't use our bins
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Maberley Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tents and huge amounts of human fouling, 14th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elizabeth Bridge, Victoria, London
